bio:
Vidgrod is a deceased Nord bandit whose corpse lies in Halldir's Cairn, adjacent to Raen and Agrius.
According to Agrius's Journal, Vidgrod and the three bandits were kicked out of the Knifepoint Gang, and took refuge in Halldir's Cairn. After a period of time, Halldir possessed the bandits, and forcefully sacrificed themselves so Halldir could gain power.
name: Vidgrod
